data.lyric:
[ti:Homemade]
[ar:Jake Owen]
[al:Greetings From...Jake]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Homemade - Jake Owen (杰克·欧文)
[00:07.45]Lyrics by：Ben Goldsmith/Jared Mullins/Drew Parker/Bobby Pinson
[00:14.90]Where I grew up gettin' dressed up means
[00:18.45]Buttoned down shirt and a good pair of jeans
[00:21.15]Wasn't Sunday supper without collard greens
[00:25.04]Dad was boss Christ is king
[00:28.27]Friday night was livin' for them lights to come on
[00:31.00]Then I turned to Miller Lites when I turned 21
[00:34.66]There's some things about me that I can't change
[00:37.72]I'll always be the man that home made
[00:42.10]Home made me love a dirt road
[00:44.69]Home made me crave some ice cold homemade
[00:48.52]Sweet tea only mama knows how to make
[00:53.03]Homemade
[00:55.24]Home made me love a small town
[00:57.54]Home made me wanna settle down in a home made
[01:01.62]For the two of us
[01:03.29]Everything I love is homemade
[01:11.13]My pickup lines didn't seem to work
[01:14.13]Guess my pickup truck must've got to her
[01:17.43]Windows down singin' every word
[01:20.43]Of that George Strait mixtape that was homemade
[01:24.78]Home made me love a dirt road
[01:27.40]Home made me crave some ice cold homemade
[01:31.22]Sweet tea only mama knows how to make
[01:35.72]Homemade
[01:37.84]Home made me love a small town
[01:40.50]Home made me wanna settle down in a home made
[01:44.33]For the two of us
[01:46.05]Everything I love is homemade
[02:03.89]Hey what we got you can't get from a store
[02:10.06]Hey the good stuff comes from the good Lord
[02:15.39]Homemade
[02:17.38]Home made me love a dirt road
[02:19.98]Home made me crave some ice cold homemade
[02:23.81]Sweet tea only mama knows how to make
[02:28.51]Homemade
[02:30.43]Home made me love a small town
[02:33.14]Home made me wanna settle down in a home made
[02:36.99]For the two of us
[02:38.64]Everything I love is homemade
[02:43.81]Homemade homemade
[02:45.71]Homemade
[02:46.98]Homemade homemade
[02:48.52]Yeah it's homemade
[02:50.17]Homemade homemade
[02:52.15]Homemade
data.trans:
[ti:Homemade]
[ar:Jake Owen]
[al:Greetings From...Jake]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:07.45]//
[00:14.90]在我长大的地方 精心打扮就意味着
[00:18.45]穿上带扣子的衬衫 搭上一条得体的牛仔裤
[00:21.15]星期天的晚餐 怎么能少了羽衣甘蓝
[00:25.04]家里由爸爸做主 基督耶稣是国王
[00:28.27]星期五的夜晚灯火通明 充斥着欢声笑语
[00:31.00]当我21岁的时候 我喜欢上了米勒淡啤酒
[00:34.66]可有些嗜好我无法改变
[00:37.72]我永远都喜欢家里制作的一切
[00:42.10]对家的眷恋让我爱上乡村土路
[00:44.69]对家的眷恋让我渴望吃到自制冷饮
[00:48.52]只有妈妈知道如何制作香甜的红茶
[00:53.03]家里制作的一切
[00:55.24]对家的眷恋让我深爱着这座小镇
[00:57.54]对家的眷恋让我想安定下来
[01:01.62]我们亲手打造温馨的家
[01:03.29]我喜欢的一切都是亲手制作的
[01:11.13]我搭讪的客套话似乎没有用
[01:14.13]我想我的皮开车一定撞到了她
[01:17.43]摇下车窗 我唱着歌
[01:20.43]都是George Strait亲手制作的混声带
[01:24.78]对家的眷恋让我爱上乡村土路
[01:27.40]对家的眷恋让我渴望吃到自制冷饮
[01:31.22]只有妈妈知道如何制作香甜的红茶
[01:35.72]家里制作的一切
[01:37.84]对家的眷恋让我深爱着这座小镇
[01:40.50]对家的眷恋让我想安定下来
[01:44.33]我们亲手打造温馨的家
[01:46.05]我喜欢的一切都是亲手制作的
[02:03.89]你在商店里买不到我们拥有的一切
[02:10.06]美好的东西是上帝的恩赐
[02:15.39]家里制作的一切
[02:17.38]对家的眷恋让我爱上乡村土路
[02:19.98]对家的眷恋让我渴望吃到自制冷饮
[02:23.81]只有妈妈知道如何制作香甜的红茶
[02:28.51]家里制作的一切
[02:30.43]对家的眷恋让我深爱着这座小镇
[02:33.14]对家的眷恋让我想安定下来
[02:36.99]我们亲手打造温馨的家
[02:38.64]我喜欢的一切都是亲手制作的
[02:43.81]亲力亲为 家里制作的一切
[02:45.71]家里制作的一切
[02:46.98]亲力亲为 家里制作的一切
[02:48.52]一切都是亲手制作
[02:50.17]亲力亲为 家里制作的一切
